languages.text: {n}Равор, подойдя, комментирует неизменно мрачным тоном:{/n} "Художества госпожи Хейдари. Она повелела начертать это... это... Видит Бог-Император, я не имею ни малейшего понятия, что это. Но мне не нравится".

{n}Ravor comes over and remarks in his usual gloomy tone,{/n} "Mistress Heydari's shenanigans. She gave the order for this... thing... to be painted... God-Emperor as my witness, I haven't got a clue what it is. But I don't like it."
languages.original_text: {n}Равор, подойдя, комментирует неизменно мрачным тоном:{/n} "Художества госпожи Хейдари. Она повелела начертать это... это... Видит Бог-Император, я не имею ни малейшего понятия, что это. Но мне не нравится".

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor comes over and remarks in his usual gloomy tone,{/n} "Mistress Heydari's shenanigans. She gave the order for this... thing... to be painted... God-Emperor as my witness, I haven't got a clue what it is. But I don't like it."
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor comes over and remarks in his usual gloomy tone,{/n} "Mistress Heydari's shenanigans. She gave the order for this... thing... to be painted... God-Emperor as my witness, I haven't got a clue what it is. But I don't like it."
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

traits.speaker: VoidMaster

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor comes over and remarks in his usual gloomy tone,{/n} "Mistress Heydari's shenanigans. She gave the order for this... thing... to be painted... God-Emperor as my witness, I haven't got a clue what it is. But I don't like it."
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}雷沃走了过来，以他惯常的阴沉语气开了口。{/n}“这是海达利女士搞的鬼，是她命令……说要画……这个东西。神皇在上，我完全看不出来这都是些什么玩意儿，但我并不喜欢。”
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor comes over and remarks in his usual gloomy tone,{/n} "Mistress Heydari's shenanigans. She gave the order for this... thing... to be painted... God-Emperor as my witness, I haven't got a clue what it is. But I don't like it."

traits.locale_text: {n}雷沃走了过来，以他惯常的阴沉语气开了口。{/n}“这是海达利女士搞的鬼，是她命令……说要画……这个东西。神皇在上，我完全看不出来这都是些什么玩意儿，但我并不喜欢。”
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}ラヴォアがやってきて、いつもの暗い口調でこう言った。{/n}「ミストレス・ヘイダリの悪ふざけです。彼女がこれを…この落書きを…描くように命じたのです…神帝陛下に誓って、私にはこれが何なのかはわかりません。とにかく気に入らないですね」
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor comes over and remarks in his usual gloomy tone,{/n} "Mistress Heydari's shenanigans. She gave the order for this... thing... to be painted... God-Emperor as my witness, I haven't got a clue what it is. But I don't like it."

traits.locale_text: {n}ラヴォアがやってきて、いつもの暗い口調でこう言った。{/n}「ミストレス・ヘイダリの悪ふざけです。彼女がこれを…この落書きを…描くように命じたのです…神帝陛下に誓って、私にはこれが何なのかはわかりません。とにかく気に入らないですね」
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}Ravor se acerca y, con su habitual tono sombrío, comenta:{/n} «Ocurrencias de la señora Heydari. Dio la orden de que se... pintara... esta cosa... Al Dios Emperador pongo por testigo de que no sé lo que es. Pero no me gusta».
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor comes over and remarks in his usual gloomy tone,{/n} "Mistress Heydari's shenanigans. She gave the order for this... thing... to be painted... God-Emperor as my witness, I haven't got a clue what it is. But I don't like it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor se acerca y, con su habitual tono sombrío, comenta:{/n} «Ocurrencias de la señora Heydari. Dio la orden de que se... pintara... esta cosa... Al Dios Emperador pongo por testigo de que no sé lo que es. Pero no me gusta».
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}Ravor s'approche et remarque avec le ton maussade dont il est coutumier :{/n} « Encore une des frasques de maîtresse Heydari. Elle a donné l'ordre qu'on fasse peindre cette... chose... Que l'Empereur-Dieu m'en soit témoin, je n'ai pas la moindre idée de ce que ce dessin représente, mais je ne l'aime pas. »
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor comes over and remarks in his usual gloomy tone,{/n} "Mistress Heydari's shenanigans. She gave the order for this... thing... to be painted... God-Emperor as my witness, I haven't got a clue what it is. But I don't like it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor s'approche et remarque avec le ton maussade dont il est coutumier :{/n} « Encore une des frasques de maîtresse Heydari. Elle a donné l'ordre qu'on fasse peindre cette... chose... Que l'Empereur-Dieu m'en soit témoin, je n'ai pas la moindre idée de ce que ce dessin représente, mais je ne l'aime pas. »
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}Ravor kommt dazu und bemerkt in seinem typisch düsteren Ton:{/n} "Eine von Herrin Heydaris Spielereien. Sie hat befohlen, dieses ... dieses Ding ... zeichnen zu lassen ... Der Gottimperators soll mein Zeuge sein, ich habe keine Ahnung, was das bedeuten soll. Es gefällt mir aber definitiv nicht."
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor comes over and remarks in his usual gloomy tone,{/n} "Mistress Heydari's shenanigans. She gave the order for this... thing... to be painted... God-Emperor as my witness, I haven't got a clue what it is. But I don't like it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor kommt dazu und bemerkt in seinem typisch düsteren Ton:{/n} "Eine von Herrin Heydaris Spielereien. Sie hat befohlen, dieses ... dieses Ding ... zeichnen zu lassen ... Der Gottimperators soll mein Zeuge sein, ich habe keine Ahnung, was das bedeuten soll. Es gefällt mir aber definitiv nicht."
traits.speaker: VoidMaster

languages.text: {n}Yanına gelen Ravor, her zamanki iç karartıcı ses tonuyla yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Üstat Heydari'nin yaramazlıkları. Bu... Şeyin yapılmasını o emretti. Tanrı İmparator şahidim olsun ki ne olduğuna dair hiçbir fikrim yok. Hoşlanmadığım kesin."
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor comes over and remarks in his usual gloomy tone,{/n} "Mistress Heydari's shenanigans. She gave the order for this... thing... to be painted... God-Emperor as my witness, I haven't got a clue what it is. But I don't like it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor yanına geliyor ve her zamanki iç karartıcı ses tonuyla yanıt veriyor:{/n} "Üstat Heydari'nin yaramazlıkları. Bu... Şeyin yapılması emrini o verdi. Tanrı İmparator şahidim olsun ki ne olduğu konusunda hiçbir fikrim yok. Ama hoşlanmadığım kesin."
traits.speaker: VoidMaster
